(*lot of repetition due to lack of mod simplification rules*)
lemma example_WFA' : "WFA example_lts B s⇩0 (inf [(s⇩0, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖺, s⇩0)]⇧ω)"
  apply (auto simp: WFA_def allsuffixes_def example_lts_def perpetuallyenabled_def)
proof-
  assume "∀s. target ([(s⇩0, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖺, s⇩0)] ! (s mod Suc (Suc 0))) = s⇩0"
  hence False: "target ([(s⇩0, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖺, s⇩0)] ! (0 mod Suc (Suc 0))) = s⇩0" by blast
  thus "𝖼 ∈ action ` range (λx. [(s⇩0, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖺, s⇩0)] ! (x mod Suc (Suc 0)))" by simp
  show "𝖻 ∈ action ` range (λx. [(s⇩0, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖺, s⇩0)] ! (x mod Suc (Suc 0)))" using False by simp
next
  fix i 
  assume "∀s. target ([(s⇩0, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖺, s⇩0)] ! (Suc (i + s) mod Suc (Suc 0))) = s⇩0"
  hence "target ([(s⇩0, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖺, s⇩0)] ! (Suc (i + Suc i) mod Suc (Suc 0))) = s⇩0" by blast
  moreover have "Suc (i + Suc i) mod Suc (Suc 0) = 0" by presburger
  ultimately have False: "target ([(s⇩0, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖺, s⇩0)] ! (0 mod Suc (Suc 0))) = s⇩0" by simp
  thus "𝖼 ∈ action ` range (λx. [(s⇩0, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖺, s⇩0)] ! (Suc (i + x) mod Suc (Suc 0)))" by simp
  show "𝖻 ∈ action ` range (λx. [(s⇩0, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖺, s⇩0)] ! (Suc (i + x) mod Suc (Suc 0)))" using False by simp
next
  fix i
  assume "∀s. ∃s'. target ([(s⇩0, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖺, s⇩0)] ! (Suc (i + s) mod Suc (Suc 0))) = s⇩1 ∧ s' = s⇩0 ∨ target ([(s⇩0, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖺, s⇩0)] ! (Suc (i + s) mod Suc (Suc 0))) = s⇩1 ∧ s' = s⇩1"
  hence "∃s'. target ([(s⇩0, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖺, s⇩0)] ! (Suc (i + i) mod Suc (Suc 0))) = s⇩1 ∧ s' = s⇩0 ∨ target ([(s⇩0, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖺, s⇩0)] ! (Suc (i + i) mod Suc (Suc 0))) = s⇩1 ∧ s' = s⇩1" by blast  
  moreover have "Suc (i + i) mod Suc (Suc 0) = 1" by presburger
  ultimately have False: "∃s'. s⇩0 = s⇩1 ∧ s' = s⇩0 ∨ s⇩0 = s⇩1 ∧ s' = s⇩1" by simp
  thus "target ([(s⇩0, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖺, s⇩0)] ! (i mod Suc (Suc 0))) = s⇩1 ⟹ 𝖺 ∈ action ` range (λx. [(s⇩0, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖺, s⇩0)] ! (Suc (i + x) mod Suc (Suc 0)))" by simp
  show "𝖺 ∈ action ` range (λx. [(s⇩0, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖺, s⇩0)] ! (Suc (i + x) mod Suc (Suc 0)))" using False by simp
qed

lemma occurringstatessubpath : "laststate' s p = s' ⟹ alloccurringstates s' p' ⊆ alloccurringstates s (extendfinpath p p')"
  by (cases p'; induct p arbitrary: s; auto)

lemma occurringactionssubpath : "alloccurringactions p' ⊆ alloccurringactions (extendfinpath p p')"
  by (cases p'; induct p; auto)

lemma enabledactionssubset : "B ⊆ A ⟹ enabledactionsset M A ⊆ enabledactionsset M B"
  by (auto simp: enabledactionsset_def)

lemma enabledactionsset_subpath: "laststate' s p = s' ⟹ enabledactionsset M (alloccurringstates s (extendfinpath p p')) ⊆ enabledactionsset M (alloccurringstates s' p')"
  using occurringstatessubpath enabledactionssubset by meson

lemma reachableactionsset_subpath: "laststate' s p = s' ⟹ reachableactionsset M B (alloccurringstates s (extendfinpath p p')) ⊆ reachableactionsset M B (alloccurringstates s' p')"
  using occurringstatessubpath reachableactionssubset by meson

(*explain, WFA satisfies all these*)
lemma WFA_subpath [simp] : "WFA M B (source t) (extendfinpath [t] p) = WFA M B (target t) p"
proof-
  have "laststate' (source t) [t] = target t" by simp
  hence "enabledactionsset M (alloccurringstates (source t) (extendfinpath [t] p)) ⊆ enabledactionsset M (alloccurringstates (target t) p)" using enabledactionsset_subpath by metis
  hence "allsuffixes (target t) p (λs p. enabledactionsset M (alloccurringstates s p) ∩ - B ⊆ alloccurringactions p) ⟹
    enabledactionsset M (alloccurringstates (source t) (extendfinpath [t] p)) ∩ - B ⊆ alloccurringactions p" by (auto simp: allsuffixes_def)
  hence "allsuffixes (target t) p (λs p. enabledactionsset M (alloccurringstates s p) ∩ - B ⊆ alloccurringactions p) ⟹
    enabledactionsset M (alloccurringstates (source t) (extendfinpath [t] p)) ∩ - B ⊆ alloccurringactions (extendfinpath [t] p)" using occurringactionssubpath by fastforce
  thus ?thesis by (auto simp: WFA_def perpetuallyenabled_alternative)
qed

lemma WFA_extendpath: "validfinpath M s p s' ⟹ WFA M B s' p' = WFA M B s (extendfinpath p p')"
  by (rule P_extendpath; simp)

lemma WFAempty : "WFA M B s (fin []) = locked M B s" 
  by (auto simp: WFA_def locked_def perpetuallyenabled_alternative)

lemma WFAinvarfin : "validfinpath M s p s' ⟹  WFA M B s (fin p) = locked M B s'"
proof-
  have "WFA M B s (fin p) =  WFA M B s (extendfinpath p (fin []))" by simp
  moreover assume "validfinpath M s p s'"
  ultimately show "WFA M B s (fin p) = locked M B s'" using WFA_extendpath WFAempty by metis
qed

lemma WFAinvarinf : "validinfpath M s p ⟹ WFA M B s (inf p) = (∀a∈- B. ∀i. source (p i) ∈ ⟦shiftdown (diamond a tt) 0⟧ M e ⟶ occurs {a} (inf (suffix i p)) ∨ occursstate (⟦shiftdown (box a ff) 0⟧ M e) (source (p i)) (inf (suffix i p)))"
  by (simp add: WFA_def allsuffixes_validinfpath enabledactionsset_def perpetuallyenabled_alternative; blast)

abbreviation irreflexive :: "('a ⇒ 'a ⇒ bool) ⇒ bool" where 
"irreflexive A ≡ (∀a. ¬ A a a)"

abbreviation preimagerelation :: "('a ⇒ 'a ⇒ bool) ⇒ 'a set ⇒ 'a set" where 
"preimagerelation A A' ≡ {a. ∀a' ∈ A'. A a a'}"

(*abbreviation imagenotrelation :: "('a ⇒ 'a ⇒ bool) ⇒ 'a set" where 
"imagenotrelation A ≡ {a'. ∀a. ¬ A a a'}"*)

definition concurrency :: "('a, 's) lts ⇒ ('a ⇒ 'a ⇒ bool) ⇒ bool" where
"concurrency M con = (irreflexive con ∧ (∀p s s'. validfinpath M s p s' ⟶ (enabledactions M s ∩ preimagerelation con (alloccurringactions (fin p)) ⊆ enabledactions M s')))"

definition JA :: "('a, 's) lts ⇒ ('a ⇒ 'a ⇒ bool) ⇒ 'a set ⇒ 's ⇒ ('a, 's) path ⇒ bool" where
"JA M con B s p = allsuffixes s p (λs p. (∀a ∈ enabledactions M s ∩ -B. (∃a'. ¬con a a' ∧ a' ∈ alloccurringactions p)))"

(*"allsuffixes s (extendfinpath [t] p) P = (P s (extendfinpath [t] p) ∧ allsuffixes (target t) p P)" *)
lemma JA_subpath [simp] : 
  assumes "enabledactions M (source t) ∩ preimagerelation con (alloccurringactions (fin [t])) ⊆ enabledactions M (target t)" 
  shows "JA M con B (source t) (extendfinpath [t] p) = JA M con B (target t) p"
proof-
  {
    fix a
    assume "allsuffixes (target t) p (λs p. (∀a ∈ enabledactions M s ∩ -B. (∃a'. ¬con a a' ∧ a' ∈ alloccurringactions p)))"
    hence assum1: "∀a ∈ enabledactions M (target t) ∩ -B. (∃a'. ¬con a a' ∧ a' ∈ alloccurringactions p)" by (simp add: allsuffixes_def)
    assume assum2: "a ∈ enabledactions M (source t) ∩ -B"
    have "¬con a (action t) ∨ con a (action t)" by auto
    moreover have "¬con a (action t) ⟹ (∃a'. ¬con a a' ∧ a' ∈ alloccurringactions (extendfinpath [t] p))" by (cases p; auto)
    moreover {
      assume "con a (action t)"
      hence "a ∈ enabledactions M (source t) ∩ preimagerelation con (alloccurringactions (fin [t]))" using assum2 by simp
      hence "∃a'. ¬con a a' ∧ a' ∈ alloccurringactions p" using assms assum1 assum2 by blast
      hence "∃a'. ¬con a a' ∧ a' ∈ alloccurringactions (extendfinpath [t] p)" using occurringactionssubpath by fastforce
    }
    ultimately have "∃a'. ¬con a a' ∧ a' ∈ alloccurringactions (extendfinpath [t] p)" by blast
  }
  thus ?thesis by (auto simp: JA_def)
qed

lemma JA_extendpath: "validfinpath M s p s' ∧ concurrency M con ⟹ JA M con B s' p' = JA M con B s (extendfinpath p p')"
  apply (rule P_extendpath[where ?P="JA M con B" and ?M=M]; simp?)
  apply (rule JA_subpath; subgoal_tac "validfinpath M (source t) [t] (target t)")
  unfolding concurrency_def apply blast
  apply simp
  done

lemma JAempty : "JA M con B s (fin []) = locked M B s" 
  by (auto simp: JA_def locked_def)

lemma JAinvarfin : "validfinpath M s p s' ∧ concurrency M con ⟹  JA M con B s (fin p) = locked M B s'"
proof-
  have "JA M con B s (fin p) =  JA M con B s (extendfinpath p (fin []))" by simp
  moreover assume "validfinpath M s p s' ∧ concurrency M con"
  ultimately show ?thesis using JA_extendpath JAempty by metis
qed

lemma JAinvarinf : 
  "validinfpath M s p ⟹ JA M con B s (inf p) = (∀a∈- B. ∀i. source (p i) ∈ ⟦shiftdown (diamond a tt) 0⟧ M e ⟶ occurs {a'. ¬ con a a'} (inf (suffix i p)) ∨ occursstate (⟦shiftdown ff 0⟧ M e) (source (p i)) (inf (suffix i p)))"
  by (simp add: JA_def allsuffixes_validinfpath; blast)

definition WHFA :: "('a, 's) lts ⇒ 'a set ⇒ 's ⇒ ('a, 's) path ⇒ bool" where
"WHFA M B s p = allsuffixes s p (λs p. perpetuallyreachable M B s p ∩ -B ⊆ alloccurringactions p)"

lemma WHFA_subpath [simp] : "WHFA M B (source t) (extendfinpath [t] p) = WHFA M B (target t) p"
proof-
  have "laststate' (source t) [t] = target t" by simp
  hence "reachableactionsset M B (alloccurringstates (source t) (extendfinpath [t] p)) ⊆ reachableactionsset M B (alloccurringstates (target t) p)" by (simp add: reachableactionsset_subpath)
  hence "allsuffixes (target t) p (λs p. reachableactionsset M B (alloccurringstates s p) ∩ - B ⊆ alloccurringactions p) ⟹
    reachableactionsset M B (alloccurringstates (source t) (extendfinpath [t] p)) ∩ - B ⊆ alloccurringactions p" by (auto simp: allsuffixes_def)
  hence "allsuffixes (target t) p (λs p. perpetuallyreachable M B s p ∩ - B ⊆ alloccurringactions p) ⟹
    perpetuallyreachable M B (source t) (extendfinpath [t] p) ∩ - B ⊆ alloccurringactions p" by (simp add: perpetuallyreachable_def reachableactionsset_def reachableactions_def)
  hence "allsuffixes (target t) p (λs p. perpetuallyreachable M B s p ∩ -B ⊆ alloccurringactions p) ⟹
    perpetuallyreachable M B (source t) (extendfinpath [t] p) ∩ - B ⊆ alloccurringactions (extendfinpath [t] p)" using occurringactionssubpath by fastforce
  thus ?thesis by (auto simp: WHFA_def)                                                                                       
qed

lemma WHFA_extendpath: "validfinpath M s p s' ⟹ WHFA M B s' p' = WHFA M B s (extendfinpath p p')"
  by (rule P_extendpath; simp)

lemma perpetuallyreachable_alternative : "perpetuallyreachable M B s p = reachableactionsset M B (alloccurringstates s p)"
 by (simp add: perpetuallyreachable_def reachableactionsset_def reachableactions_def)

lemma WHFAempty : "WHFA M B s (fin []) = locked M B s" 
  apply (auto simp: WHFA_def locked_def perpetuallyreachable_alternative)
proof-
  fix a s'
  assume assum1: "reachableactionsset M B {s} ∩ - B = {}"
  assume "(s, a, s') ∈ transition M"
  hence "validfinpath M s [] s ∧ ¬ occurs B (fin []) ∧ (s, a, s') ∈ transition M" by simp
  hence "a ∈ reachableactionsset M B {s}" unfolding reachableactionsset_def enabledactions_def by blast
  thus "a ∈ B" using assum1 by auto
next
  fix a
  assume assum1: "{a. ∃s'. (s, a, s') ∈ transition M} ⊆ B"
  assume "a ∈ reachableactionsset M B {s}" 
  then obtain p s' where "validfinpath M s p s' ∧ ¬ occurs B (fin p) ∧ a ∈ enabledactions M s'" by (auto simp: reachableactionsset_def)
  hence "∃s'. (s, a, s') ∈ transition M" 
    apply (induct p)
    apply simp
    using assum1 apply (subgoal_tac "(s, action aa, target aa) ∈ transition M ∧ action aa ∈ -B"; (blast|auto))
    done
  hence "a ∈ B" using assum1 by blast
  thus "a ∉ B ⟹ False" by simp
qed

lemma WHFAinvarfin : "validfinpath M s p s' ⟹  WHFA M B s (fin p) = locked M B s'"
proof-
  have "WHFA M B s (fin p) =  WHFA M B s (extendfinpath p (fin []))" by simp
  moreover assume "validfinpath M s p s'"
  ultimately show "WHFA M B s (fin p) = locked M B s'" using WHFA_extendpath WHFAempty by metis
qed

lemma WHFAinvarinf : 
  assumes "finite (-B)"
  shows "validinfpath M s p ⟹ WHFA M B s (inf p) = (∀a∈-B. ∀i. source (p i) ∈ ⟦shiftdown (Diamond (Star (Acts (-B))) (diamond a tt)) 0⟧ M e ⟶ occurs {a} (inf (suffix i p)) ∨ occursstate (⟦shiftdown (Box (Star (Acts (-B))) (box a ff)) 0⟧ M e) (source (p i)) (inf (suffix i p)))"
  apply (simp only: shiftdownDiamond shiftdownBox shiftdown.simps)
proof-
  have "validinfpath M s p ⟹ WHFA M B s (inf p) = (∀a ∈ -B. ∀ i. a ∈ reachableactions M B (source (p i)) ⟶ occurs {a} (inf (suffix i p)) ∨ occursstate {s. a ∉ reachableactions M B s} (source (p i)) (inf (suffix i p)))" by (simp add: WHFA_def allsuffixes_validinfpath perpetuallyreachable_def; blast)
  moreover {
    have "⋀a. {s. a ∉ reachableactions M B s} = {s. s ∈ ⟦Box (Star (Acts (-B))) (box a ff)⟧ M e}" using assms by (simp only: Boxnotreachable)
    moreover have "⋀a. {s. s ∈ ⟦Box (Star (Acts (-B))) (box a ff)⟧ M e} = ⟦Box (Star (Acts (-B))) (box a ff)⟧ M e" by blast
    ultimately have "⋀a. {s. a ∉ reachableactions M B s} = ⟦Box (Star (Acts (-B))) (box a ff)⟧ M e" by simp
  }
  ultimately show "validinfpath M s p ⟹ WHFA M B s (inf p) = (∀a∈-B. ∀i. (source (p i) ∈ ⟦Diamond (Star (Acts (-B))) (diamond a tt)⟧ M e) ⟶ occurs {a} (inf (suffix i p)) ∨ occursstate (⟦Box (Star (Acts (-B))) (box a ff)⟧ M e) (source (p i)) (inf (suffix i p)))" using assms by (simp only: Diamondreachable)
qed

definition SFA :: "('a, 's) lts ⇒ 'a set ⇒ 's ⇒ ('a, 's) path ⇒ bool" where
"SFA M B s p = allsuffixes s p (λs p. relentlesslyenabled M s p ∩ -B ⊆ alloccurringactions p)"

lemma SFA_WFA : "SFA M B s p ⟹ WFA M B s p"
  unfolding SFA_def WFA_def allsuffixes_def
  using perpetuallyenabled_relentlesslyenabled by fastforce

lemma relentlesslyenabled_subpath : "relentlesslyenabled M (source t) (extendfinpath [t] p) ⊆ relentlesslyenabled M (target t) p"
proof
  fix a
  assume "a ∈ relentlesslyenabled M (source t) (extendfinpath [t] p)"
  hence "allsuffixes (source t) (extendfinpath [t] p) (λs p. ∃s∈alloccurringstates s p. a ∈ enabledactions M s)" by (simp add: relentlesslyenabled_def)
  hence "allsuffixes (target t) p (λs p. ∃s∈alloccurringstates s p. a ∈ enabledactions M s)" by simp
  thus "a ∈ relentlesslyenabled M (target t) p" by (simp add: relentlesslyenabled_def)
qed

lemma SFA_subpath [simp] : "SFA M B (source t) (extendfinpath [t] p) = SFA M B (target t) p"
  apply (auto simp: SFA_def)
proof-
  fix a
  assume assum1: "allsuffixes (target t) p (λs p. relentlesslyenabled M s p ∩ - B ⊆ alloccurringactions p)"
  assume "a ∈ relentlesslyenabled M (source t) (extendfinpath [t] p)"
  hence "a ∈ relentlesslyenabled M (target t) p" using relentlesslyenabled_subpath subset_iff by meson
  moreover assume "a ∉ B"
  ultimately have "a ∈ alloccurringactions p" using assum1 by (auto simp: allsuffixes_def)
  thus "a ∈ alloccurringactions (extendfinpath [t] p)" using occurringactionssubpath subset_iff by meson
qed

lemma SFA_extendpath: "validfinpath M s p s' ⟹ SFA M B s' p' = SFA M B s (extendfinpath p p')"
  by (rule P_extendpath; simp)

(*lemma perpetuallyreachable_alternative : "perpetuallyreachable M B s p = reachableactionsset M B (alloccurringstates s p)"
 by (simp add: perpetuallyreachable_def reachableactionsset_def reachableactions_def)*)

lemma SFAempty : "SFA M B s (fin []) = locked M B s" 
  by (auto simp: SFA_def locked_def relentlesslyenabled_def)

lemma SFAinvarfin : "validfinpath M s p s' ⟹  SFA M B s (fin p) = locked M B s'"
proof-
  have "SFA M B s (fin p) =  SFA M B s (extendfinpath p (fin []))" by simp
  moreover assume "validfinpath M s p s'"
  ultimately show "SFA M B s (fin p) = locked M B s'" using SFA_extendpath SFAempty by metis
qed

text ‹Defining violating paths, using ‹freeuntiloccurrence›.›

definition freeuntiloccurrence :: "('a, 's) path ⇒ 'a set ⇒ 'a set ⇒ bool" where
"freeuntiloccurrence p α⇩f α⇩e = ((∃i. ¬(occurs α⇩f (fin (pref i p))) ∧ action (ind i p) ∈ α⇩e)
  ∨ ¬(occurs α⇩f p))"

definition violating :: "('a, 's) path ⇒ 'a rexp ⇒ 'a set ⇒ 'a set ⇒ bool" where
"violating p ρ α⇩f α⇩e = (∃i. match ρ (pref i p) ∧ freeuntiloccurrence (suff i p) α⇩f α⇩e)"

lemma violatingempty [simp] : "violating p One α⇩f α⇩e = freeuntiloccurrence p α⇩f α⇩e"
proof-
  have "violating p One α⇩f α⇩e = (∃i. (pref i p) = [] ∧ freeuntiloccurrence (suff i p) α⇩f α⇩e)" by (simp add : match_def violating_def)
  moreover have "... = (∃i. (i = 0 ∨ p = fin []) ∧ freeuntiloccurrence (suff i p) α⇩f α⇩e)" by auto
  moreover have "... = (freeuntiloccurrence p α⇩f α⇩e)" using nosuffix by metis
  ultimately show ?thesis by auto
qed

text ‹Definition of ‹freeuntiloccurrence› does not specify that ‹i› is within the length of the path.
But if the action occurs only outside the bound, then it does not occur.›

lemma occursoutsidebound : 
  assumes "∃i ≥ length p'. ¬ occurs α⇩f (fin (take i p')) ∧ action (p'!i) ∈ α⇩e"
  shows "¬ occurs α⇩f (fin p')"
  using assms take_all by metis

lemma freeuntiloccurrence_inbound : "freeuntiloccurrence p α⇩f α⇩e = (¬ occurs α⇩f p ∨ (∃i ∈ indicespath p. ¬occurs α⇩f (fin (pref i p)) ∧ action (ind i p) ∈ α⇩e))"
  apply (cases p; simp add: freeuntiloccurrence_def del: occurssimps)
  using occursoutsidebound leI apply blast+
  done

text ‹The existence of a progressing path that is ‹α⇩f› free until occurrence of ‹α⇩e› can be split into 4 cases.›

lemma freeuntiloccurrence_cases :
  shows "freeuntiloccurrence (fin p) α⇩f α⇩e = (¬ occurs α⇩f (fin p) ∨ (∃i < length p. ¬(occurs α⇩f (fin (take i p))) ∧ action (p!i) ∈ α⇩e))"
  and "freeuntiloccurrence (inf p') α⇩f α⇩e = (¬ occurs α⇩f (inf p')  ∨ (∃i. ¬(occurs α⇩f (fin (prefix i p'))) ∧ action (p' i) ∈ α⇩e))"
  apply (simp_all only: freeuntiloccurrence_inbound)
  apply simp_all
  done

lemma freeuntiloccurrenceprogressing_cases [simp] : 
  shows "(freeuntiloccurrence (fin p) α⇩f α⇩e ∧ progressing M s B (fin p)) = 
   (∃s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ locked M B s' ∧ (¬ occurs α⇩f (fin p) ∨ (∃i < length p. ¬(occurs α⇩f (fin (take i p))) ∧ action (p!i) ∈ α⇩e)))"
  and "(freeuntiloccurrence (inf p') α⇩f α⇩e ∧ progressing M s B (inf p')) = 
   (validinfpath M s p' ∧ (¬ occurs α⇩f (inf p') ∨ (∃i. ¬(occurs α⇩f (fin (prefix i p'))) ∧ action (p' i) ∈ α⇩e)))"
  apply (simp_all only: freeuntiloccurrence_cases)
  apply auto
  done

lemma existfreeuntiloccurrenceprogressing_cases_pred [simp] : 
  shows "(∃ p. freeuntiloccurrence p α⇩f α⇩e ∧ progressing M s B p ∧ P s p) = 
 ((∃p' s'. validfinpath M s p' s' ∧ ¬ occurs α⇩f (fin p') ∧ locked M B s' ∧ P s (fin p')) ∨ 
  (∃p' s'. validfinpath M s p' s' ∧ (∃i < length p'. ¬(occurs α⇩f (fin (take i p'))) ∧ action (p'!i) ∈ α⇩e) ∧ locked M B s' ∧ P s (fin p')) ∨
  (∃p'. validinfpath M s p' ∧ ¬ occurs α⇩f (inf p') ∧ P s (inf p')) ∨
  (∃p'. validinfpath M s p' ∧  (∃i. ¬(occurs α⇩f (fin (prefix i p'))) ∧ action (p' i) ∈ α⇩e) ∧ P s (inf p')))"
  (is "?L = ?R")
proof
  assume ?L
  then obtain p where assum1: "freeuntiloccurrence p α⇩f α⇩e ∧ progressing M s B p ∧ P s p" by auto
  {
    fix finp
    assume "p = fin finp"
    hence "freeuntiloccurrence (fin finp) α⇩f α⇩e ∧ progressing M s B (fin finp) ∧ P s (fin finp)" using assum1 by simp
    hence ?R using freeuntiloccurrenceprogressing_cases(1) by metis
  }
  moreover {
    fix infp
    assume "p = inf infp"
    hence "freeuntiloccurrence (inf infp) α⇩f α⇩e ∧ progressing M s B (inf infp) ∧ P s (inf infp)" using assum1 by simp
    hence ?R using freeuntiloccurrenceprogressing_cases(2) by metis
  }
  ultimately show ?R by (rule path.exhaust; simp)
next
  show "?R ⟹ ?L" using freeuntiloccurrenceprogressing_cases by meson
qed

lemma existfreeuntiloccurrenceprogressing_cases [simp] : 
  "(∃ p. freeuntiloccurrence p α⇩f α⇩e ∧ progressing M s B p) = 
 ((∃p' s'. validfinpath M s p' s' ∧ ¬ occurs α⇩f (fin p') ∧ locked M B s') ∨ 
  (∃p' s'. validfinpath M s p' s' ∧ (∃i < length p'. ¬(occurs α⇩f (fin (take i p'))) ∧ action (p'!i) ∈ α⇩e) ∧ locked M B s') ∨
  (∃p'. validinfpath M s p' ∧ ¬ occurs α⇩f (inf p')) ∨
  (∃p'. validinfpath M s p' ∧  (∃i. ¬(occurs α⇩f (fin (prefix i p'))) ∧ action (p' i) ∈ α⇩e)))"
proof-
  have "(∃ p. freeuntiloccurrence p α⇩f α⇩e ∧ progressing M s B p ∧ True) = 
 ((∃p' s'. validfinpath M s p' s' ∧ ¬ occurs α⇩f (fin p') ∧ locked M B s' ∧ True) ∨ 
  (∃p' s'. validfinpath M s p' s' ∧ (∃i < length p'. ¬(occurs α⇩f (fin (take i p'))) ∧ action (p'!i) ∈ α⇩e) ∧ locked M B s' ∧ True) ∨
  (∃p'. validinfpath M s p' ∧ ¬ occurs α⇩f (inf p') ∧ True) ∨
  (∃p'. validinfpath M s p' ∧  (∃i. ¬(occurs α⇩f (fin (prefix i p'))) ∧ action (p' i) ∈ α⇩e) ∧ True))"
    by (rule existfreeuntiloccurrenceprogressing_cases_pred)
  thus ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma prefixextendinfpath [simp]: "prefix (Suc i) (t ## p) = t # (prefix i p)"
  by (induct i; simp)

lemma invariantextension' : 
  assumes "⋀s. enabledactions M s = {} ⟹ P s"
  and "∄p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ P s'"
  shows "∃a s'. (s, a, s') ∈ transition M ∧ (∄p s''. validfinpath M s' p s'' ∧ P s'')"
proof-
  have "enabledactions M s ≠ {}"
  proof
    assume "enabledactions M s = {}"
    hence "validfinpath M s [] s ∧ P s" using assms(1) by simp
    thus False using assms(2) by blast
  qed
  then obtain a s' where res1 : "(s, a, s') ∈ transition M" using actionenabled by metis
  let ?t = "(s, a, s')"
  have "∄p s''. validfinpath M s' p s'' ∧ P s''"
  proof
    assume "∃p s''. validfinpath M s' p s'' ∧ P s''"
    then obtain p s'' where "validfinpath M s' p s'' ∧ P s''" by auto
    hence "validfinpath M s (?t # p) s'' ∧ P s''" using res1 by simp
    thus False using assms(2) by blast
  qed
  thus ?thesis using res1 by auto
qed

lemma invariantextension : 
  assumes "∄p s''. validfinpath M s p s'' ∧ enabledactions M s'' = {}"
  shows "∃a s'. (s, a, s') ∈ transition M ∧ (∄p s''. validfinpath M s' p s'' ∧ enabledactions M s'' = {})"
  apply (rule invariantextension')
  using assms apply blast+
  done

text ‹Defining functions to structurally create infinite paths (that are fair)›

lemma validinfpathsplitlaststate : "p ≠ []  ⟹ (validfinpath M s p (laststate p) ∧ validinfpath M (laststate p) p') = validinfpath M s (conc p p')"
  using validinfpathsplit validfinpathlaststate by metis

function recursiveconcpaths :: "('s ⇒ ('a, 's) finpath) ⇒ 's ⇒ nat ⇒ 's × 'a × 's" where
"recursiveconcpaths succ s n = (if succ s = [] then undefined else (if n < length (succ s) then (succ s)!n else (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate (succ s)) (n - length (succ s)))))"
  by auto
termination 
  apply (relation "measure (λ(succ,s,n). n)")
  apply auto
  apply (subgoal_tac "n > 0")
  apply simp
  using length_greater_0_conv apply fastforce
  done

fun ithpath :: "('s ⇒ ('a, 's) finpath) ⇒ 's ⇒ nat ⇒ ('a, 's) finpath" where
"ithpath succ s 0 = succ s" |
"ithpath succ s (Suc i) = succ (laststate (ithpath succ s i))"

lemma ithpath_right : "ithpath succ s (Suc i) = ithpath succ (laststate (succ s)) i"
  by (induct i; simp)

fun concipaths :: "('s ⇒ ('a, 's) finpath) ⇒ 's ⇒ nat ⇒ ('a, 's) finpath" where
"concipaths succ s 0 = []" |
"concipaths succ s (Suc i) = succ s @ concipaths succ (laststate (succ s)) i"

lemma concipaths_right : "concipaths succ s (Suc i) = concipaths succ s i @ ithpath succ s i"
  apply (induct i arbitrary: s)
  apply (simp)
  apply (simp add: ithpath_right del: ithpath.simps)
  done

lemma ithpath_somesucc : 
  assumes "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s ∈ S'. laststate (succ s) ∈ S')"
  shows "∃s' ∈ S'. ithpath succ s i = succ s'"
  by (induct i; auto simp: assms)

lemma ithpath_laststate :
  assumes "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s ∈ S'. laststate (succ s) ∈ S')"
  shows "laststate (ithpath succ s i) ∈ S'"
  by (induct i; simp add: assms)

lemma predicate_ithpath : 
  assumes "P (succ s) ∧ s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s ∈ S'. P (succ s) ⟶ P (succ (laststate (succ s))) ∧ laststate (succ s) ∈ S')"
  shows "P (ithpath succ s i)"
  apply (induct i)
  apply (simp add: assms)
proof-
  fix i
  have "P (ithpath succ s (Suc i)) ∧ laststate (ithpath succ s i) ∈ S'" by (induct i; simp add: assms)
  thus "P (ithpath succ s (Suc i))" by (simp add: assms)
qed

lemma ithpath_notempty : "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s ∈ S'. succ s ≠ [] ∧ laststate (succ s) ∈ S') ⟶ ithpath succ s i ≠ []"
  apply (induct i arbitrary : s)
  apply simp
   using ithpath_right apply metis
  done

lemma allithpath_notempty : "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s ∈ S'. succ s ≠ [] ∧ laststate (succ s) ∈ S') ⟹ (∀j < i. ithpath succ s j ≠ [])"
  using ithpath_notempty by metis

lemma lengthconcipaths : "(∀j < i. ithpath succ s j ≠ []) ⟶ (length (concipaths succ s i)) ≥ i"
  apply (induct i)
  apply simp
   apply (simp only : concipaths_right)
proof
  fix i
  assume IH : "(∀j<i. ithpath succ s j ≠ []) ⟶ i ≤ length (concipaths succ s i)"
  assume assum1 : "∀j<Suc i. ithpath succ s j ≠ []"
  hence "i ≤ length (concipaths succ s i)" using IH by auto
  moreover have "Suc 0 ≤ length (ithpath succ s i)" by (simp add: leI assum1)
  ultimately show "Suc i ≤ length (concipaths succ s i @ ithpath succ s i)" by auto
qed

lemma recursiveconcpaths_ithpath : "m = length (concipaths succ s i) ∧ k < length (ithpath succ s i) ∧ (∀j ≤ i. ithpath succ s j ≠ []) ⟹ recursiveconcpaths succ s (m + k) = (ithpath succ s i) ! k"
  apply (induct i arbitrary : m s)
  apply simp
proof-
  fix i m s
  assume IH : "(⋀m s. m = length (concipaths succ s i) ∧ k < length (ithpath succ s i) ∧  (∀j≤i. ithpath succ s j ≠ []) ⟹ recursiveconcpaths succ s (m + k) = ithpath succ s i ! k)" 
  assume assum1: "m = length (concipaths succ s (Suc i)) ∧ k < length (ithpath succ s (Suc i)) ∧ (∀j≤Suc i. ithpath succ s j ≠ [])"
  hence "m + k ≥ length (succ s) ∧ succ s ≠ []" by auto
  hence "recursiveconcpaths succ s (m + k) = recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate (succ s)) ((m - length (succ s)) + k)" using assum1 by auto
  moreover have "... = ithpath succ (laststate (succ s)) i ! k"
    apply (rule IH)
    using assum1 apply auto
    using ithpath_right assum1 Suc_le_mono apply metis+
    done
  moreover have "... = ithpath succ s (Suc i) ! k" by (simp only: ithpath_right)
  ultimately show "recursiveconcpaths succ s (m + k) = ithpath succ s (Suc i) ! k" by simp
qed

lemma take_all_but_last : "l ≠ [] ⟹ (take (length l - 1) l) @ [l ! (length l - 1)] = l" 
proof-
  assume assum1: "l ≠ []"
  hence "(take (length l - 1) l) @ [l ! (length l - 1)] = (take (length l - 1) l) @ [hd (drop (length l - 1) l)]" by (simp add: hd_drop_conv_nth)
  moreover have "... = l" by (simp add: take_hd_drop assum1)
  ultimately show ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma subsequence_eq_list : "length l = (j - i) ∧ (∀k. k≥i ∧ k<j ⟶ w k = l!(k - i)) ⟹ subsequence w i j = l"
  apply (simp add: subsequence_def)
  apply (induct j arbitrary: l; simp)
  apply auto
proof-
  fix j 
  fix l :: "'a list"
  assume IH : "(⋀l'. length l' = j - i ∧ (∀k. i ≤ k ∧ k < j ⟶ l ! (k - i) = l' ! (k - i)) ⟹ map w [i..<j] = l')"
  assume assum1: "length l = Suc j - i"
  hence "length (take (j - i) l) = j - i" by auto
  moreover have "∀k. i ≤ k ∧ k < j ⟶ l ! (k - i) = (take (j - i) l) ! (k - i)" by auto
  ultimately have "map w [i..<j] = take (j - i) l" using IH by metis
  hence "map w [i..<j] @ [l ! (j - i)] = (take (j - i) l) @ [l ! (j - i)]" by auto
  moreover assume "i ≤ j"
  ultimately have "l ≠ [] ∧ map w [i..<j] @ [l ! (j - i)] = (take (length l - 1) l) @ [l ! (length l - 1)]" using assum1 by auto
  thus "map w [i..<j] @ [l ! (j - i)] = l" using assum1 take_all_but_last by metis
qed
  
lemma subsequence_recursiveconcpaths : "n = length (concipaths succ s i) ∧ k = length (ithpath succ s i) ∧ (∀j ≤ i. ithpath succ s j ≠ []) ⟹ subsequence (recursiveconcpaths succ s) n (n + k) = ithpath succ s i"
  apply (rule subsequence_eq_list)
proof-
  assume assum1: "n = length (concipaths succ s i) ∧ k = length (ithpath succ s i) ∧ (∀j≤i. ithpath succ s j ≠ [])"
  have "(∀m. n ≤ m ∧ m < n + k ⟶ recursiveconcpaths succ s m = ithpath succ s i ! (m - n))"
    apply (rule allI)
  proof
    fix m
    assume assum2: "n ≤ m ∧ m < n + k"
    hence "m - n < length (ithpath succ s i)" using assum1 by auto
    hence "recursiveconcpaths succ s (n + (m - n)) = (ithpath succ s i) ! (m - n)" using recursiveconcpaths_ithpath assum1 by metis
    thus "recursiveconcpaths succ s m = ithpath succ s i ! (m - n)" by (simp add: assum2)
  qed
  thus "length (ithpath succ s i) = n + k - n ∧ (∀m. n ≤ m ∧ m < n + k ⟶ recursiveconcpaths succ s m = ithpath succ s i ! (m - n))" using assum1 by auto
qed

lemma existsconcipaths : "(∀j < i. ithpath succ s j ≠ []) ⟹ concipaths succ s i = prefix (length (concipaths succ s i)) (recursiveconcpaths succ s)"
  apply (induct i arbitrary: s)
  apply simp
   apply (simp only: concipaths_right)
proof-
  fix i s
  assume IH : "(⋀s. (∀j<i. ithpath succ s j ≠ []) ⟹ concipaths succ s i = prefix (length (concipaths succ s i)) (recursiveconcpaths succ s))"
  assume assum1 : "(∀j<Suc i. ithpath succ s j ≠ [])"
  hence "prefix (length (concipaths succ s i)) (recursiveconcpaths succ s) = concipaths succ s i" using IH by auto
  moreover have "prefix (length (concipaths succ s i @ ithpath succ s i)) (recursiveconcpaths succ s) = 
    (prefix (length (concipaths succ s i)) (recursiveconcpaths succ s)) @ (subsequence (recursiveconcpaths succ s) (length (concipaths succ s i)) (length (concipaths succ s i) + length (ithpath succ s i)))" 
    by (simp add: subsequence_append)
  moreover have "(subsequence (recursiveconcpaths succ s) (length (concipaths succ s i)) (length (concipaths succ s i) + length (ithpath succ s i))) = ithpath succ s i"
    by (simp add: assum1 subsequence_recursiveconcpaths)
  ultimately show "concipaths succ s i @ ithpath succ s i = prefix (length (concipaths succ s i @ ithpath succ s i)) (recursiveconcpaths succ s)" by auto
qed

lemma concipaths_nth : "(∀j < i. ithpath succ s j ≠ []) ∧ n < i ⟹ (concipaths succ s i) ! n = recursiveconcpaths succ s n"
proof-
  assume assum1 : "(∀j < i. ithpath succ s j ≠ []) ∧ n < i"
  hence length : "length (concipaths succ s i) ≥ i " by (simp add: lengthconcipaths)
  moreover have "concipaths succ s i = prefix (length (concipaths succ s i)) (recursiveconcpaths succ s)" using assum1 existsconcipaths by metis
  ultimately have "(concipaths succ s i) ! n = (prefix (length (concipaths succ s i)) (recursiveconcpaths succ s)) ! n" by simp
  moreover have "... = recursiveconcpaths succ s n" using length assum1 by auto
  ultimately show ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma suffix_recursiveconcpaths : "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s ∈ S'. succ s ≠ [] ∧ laststate (succ s) ∈ S') ⟹ ∃s' ∈ S'. ∃j < length (succ s'). suffix i (recursiveconcpaths succ s) = conc (drop j (succ s')) (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate (succ s')))"
  apply (induct i)
proof-
  assume "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s ∈ S'. succ s ≠ [] ∧ laststate (succ s) ∈ S')"
  hence "succ s ≠ [] ∧ s ∈ S' ∧ suffix 0 (recursiveconcpaths succ s) = conc (drop 0 (succ s)) (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate (succ s)))" by auto
  thus "∃s' ∈ S'. ∃j < length (succ s'). suffix 0 (recursiveconcpaths succ s) = conc (drop j (succ s')) (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate (succ s')))" by blast
next
  fix i
  assume IH : "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s∈S'. succ s ≠ [] ∧ laststate (succ s) ∈ S') ⟹ ∃s'∈S'. ∃j<length (succ s'). suffix i (recursiveconcpaths succ s) = conc (drop j (succ s')) (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate (succ s')))"
  moreover assume assum1: "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s∈S'. succ s ≠ [] ∧ laststate (succ s) ∈ S')"
  ultimately obtain j s' where "s' ∈ S' ∧ j < length (succ s') ∧ suffix i (recursiveconcpaths succ s) = conc (drop j (succ s')) (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate (succ s')))" by auto
  moreover have "Suc i = i + 1" by auto
  ultimately have res1: "s' ∈ S' ∧ j < length (succ s') ∧ suffix (Suc i) (recursiveconcpaths succ s) = suffix 1 (conc (drop j (succ s')) (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate (succ s'))))" using suffix_suffix by metis
  hence "length (succ s') = Suc j ∨ length (succ s') > Suc j" by auto
  moreover {
    assume assum2: "length (succ s') = Suc j"
    hence "suffix (Suc i) (recursiveconcpaths succ s) = recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate (succ s'))" using res1 by simp
    moreover have "... = conc (drop 0 (succ (laststate (succ s')))) (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate (succ (laststate (succ s')))))" using res1 assum1 by auto
    moreover have "0 < length (succ (laststate (succ s'))) ∧ laststate (succ s') ∈ S'" using res1 assum1 by auto
    ultimately have "∃s'∈S'. ∃j < length (succ s'). suffix (Suc i) (recursiveconcpaths succ s) = conc (drop j (succ s')) (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate (succ s')))" by metis
  }
  moreover {
    assume "length (succ s') > Suc j"
    moreover have "s' ∈ S' ∧ suffix (Suc i) (recursiveconcpaths succ s) =  conc (drop (Suc j) (succ s')) (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate (succ s')))" using Suc_le_eq res1 by auto
    ultimately have "∃s'∈S'. ∃j < length (succ s'). suffix (Suc i) (recursiveconcpaths succ s) = conc (drop j (succ s')) (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate (succ s')))" by auto
  }
  ultimately show "∃s'∈S'. ∃j < length (succ s'). suffix (Suc i) (recursiveconcpaths succ s) = conc (drop j (succ s')) (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate (succ s')))" by auto
qed
 
lemma unfoldrecursiveconcpaths : 
  assumes "succ s ≠ []"
  shows "recursiveconcpaths succ s = conc (succ s) (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate (succ s)))"     
  using assms by auto

lemma source_eq_target :
  assumes "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s ∈ S'. succ s ≠ [] ∧ (source ((succ s) ! 0)) = s ∧ laststate (succ s) ∈ S')"
  shows "laststate (ithpath succ s n) ∈ S' ∧ source ((ithpath succ s (Suc n)) ! 0) = laststate (ithpath succ s n)"
  apply (induct n)
  apply (simp add: assms)
   unfolding ithpath.simps using assms apply blast
  done

lemma lasttarget_eq_targetithpath : 
  assumes "ithpath succ s n ≠ []"
  shows "laststate (concipaths succ s (Suc n)) = laststate (ithpath succ s n)"
  by (simp add: concipaths_right assms del: concipaths.simps)

lemma laststate_suc :
  "((λs. laststate (succ s)) ^^ Suc n) s = ((λs. laststate (succ s)) ^^ n) (laststate (succ s))"
  by (induct n; simp)

lemma source_ithpath_eqlaststate :
  assumes "∀s ∈ S'. source (succ s ! 0) = s ∧ laststate (succ s) ∈ S'"
  shows "s ∈ S' ⟶ source (ithpath succ s n ! 0) = ((λs. laststate (succ s)) ^^ n) s"
  apply (induct n arbitrary: s)
  apply (simp add: assms) 
   apply (simp only: ithpath_right)
   using laststate_suc assms apply metis
  done

lemma source_ithpath_eqtarget_Suc : 
  "ithpath succ s n ≠ [] ∧ validfinpath M s' (ithpath succ s n) s'' ⟹ ((λs. laststate (succ s)) ^^ (Suc n)) s = s''"
  apply (induct n arbitrary: s)
  apply simp
  using validfinpathlaststate apply meson
   apply (simp only: laststate_suc)
   apply (simp add: ithpath_right del: ithpath.simps)
  done

lemma source_ithpath_eqtarget_concipaths_Suc : 
  "ithpath succ s n ≠ [] ∧ validfinpath M s (concipaths succ s (Suc n)) s' ⟹ ((λs. laststate (succ s)) ^^ (Suc n)) s = s'"
  apply (simp only: concipaths_right validfinpathsplit)
proof-
  assume "ithpath succ s n ≠ [] ∧ (∃s''. validfinpath M s (concipaths succ s n) s'' ∧ validfinpath M s'' (ithpath succ s n) s')"
  then obtain s'' where "ithpath succ s n ≠ [] ∧ validfinpath M s'' (ithpath succ s n) s'" by auto
  thus "((λs. laststate (succ s)) ^^ (Suc n)) s = s'" using source_ithpath_eqtarget_Suc by simp
qed

lemma validinfpathconc : "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s ∈ S'. succ s ≠ [] ∧ (∃s' ∈ S'. validfinpath M s (succ s) s')) ⟹ validinfpath M s (recursiveconcpaths succ s)"
  apply (simp add: validinfpath_def del: recursiveconcpaths.simps)
proof
  assume "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s ∈ S'. succ s ≠ [] ∧ (∃s' ∈ S'. validfinpath M s (succ s) s'))"
  hence assum1 : "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s ∈ S'. succ s ≠ [] ∧ validfinpath M s (succ s) (laststate (succ s)) ∧ laststate (succ s) ∈ S')" using validfinpathlaststate by metis
  have "s = source ((succ s)!0)" using validfinpathsource assum1 by metis
  thus "s = source (recursiveconcpaths succ s 0)" using assum1 by simp
  have res1: "∀n. ∃s' ∈ S'. validfinpath M s (concipaths succ s n) s'"
  proof
    fix n
    have "s ∈ S' ⟶ (∃s' ∈ S'. validfinpath M s (concipaths succ s n) s')" by (induct n arbitrary: s; simp; metis assum1)
    thus "∃s' ∈ S'. validfinpath M s (concipaths succ s n) s'" using assum1 by simp
  qed
  show "∀n. recursiveconcpaths succ s n ∈ transition M ∧ target (recursiveconcpaths succ s n) = source (recursiveconcpaths succ s (Suc n))"
  proof
    fix n
    have allnonempty : "(∀j<Suc (Suc n). ithpath succ s j ≠ [])" using allithpath_notempty assum1 by metis
    hence "Suc (Suc n) ≤ length (concipaths succ s (Suc (Suc n)))" by (simp only : lengthconcipaths)
    hence "n < length (concipaths succ s (Suc (Suc n))) ∧ Suc n < length (concipaths succ s (Suc (Suc n)))" by arith
    hence "(concipaths succ s (Suc (Suc n)))!n ∈ transition M ∧ target ((concipaths succ s (Suc (Suc n)))! n) = source ((concipaths succ s (Suc (Suc n)))!(Suc n))" using ithtransitionfinpath ithtargetsourcefinpath res1 by metis
    moreover have "Suc n < Suc (Suc n) ∧ n < Suc (Suc n)" by auto
    moreover from this allnonempty have "recursiveconcpaths succ s (Suc n) = (concipaths succ s (Suc (Suc n)))!(Suc n) ∧ recursiveconcpaths succ s n = (concipaths succ s (Suc (Suc n)))! n" by (simp only: concipaths_nth)
    ultimately show "recursiveconcpaths succ s n ∈ transition M ∧ target (recursiveconcpaths succ s n) = source (recursiveconcpaths succ s (Suc n))" by simp
  qed
qed

lemma successorlemma :
  assumes "(s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s'. s' ∈ S' ⟶ (∃t. source t = s' ∧ P t ∧ t ∈ transition M ∧ target t ∈ S')))"
  shows "(∃ p. validinfpath M s p ∧ (∀n. P (p n)))"
proof-
  from assms obtain succ where assum1: "∀s'. s' ∈ S' ⟶ source (succ s') = s' ∧ P (succ s') ∧ (succ s') ∈ transition M ∧ target (succ s') ∈ S'" by metis
  let ?p = "recursiveconcpaths (λs'. [succ s']) s"
  have "validinfpath M s ?p" by (rule validinfpathconc [where ?S'=S']; simp add: assum1 assms)
  moreover {
    fix n
    have "s ∈ S' ⟶ P (?p n)" by (induct n arbitrary: s; simp add: assum1)
  }
  ultimately have "validinfpath M s ?p ∧ (∀n. P (?p n))" using assms by simp
  thus ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma successorlemma_no_pred : 
  assumes "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s'. s' ∈ S' ⟶ (∃t. source t = s' ∧ t ∈ transition M ∧ target t ∈ S'))"
  shows "∃ p. validinfpath M s p"
proof-
  from assms have assum1: "(s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s'. s' ∈ S' ⟶ (∃t. source t = s' ∧ True ∧ t ∈ transition M ∧ target t ∈ S')))" by auto
  have "(∃ p. validinfpath M s p ∧ (∀n. (λt. True) (p n)))"
    apply (rule successorlemma)
    using assum1 apply auto
    done
  thus "(∃ p. validinfpath M s p)" by auto
qed

(*opschonen*)
lemma validpredconc :
  assumes "Q s [] ∧ (∀p p'. p ≠ [] ∧ Q s p ∧ Q (laststate p) p' ⟶ Q s (p @ p'))"
  and "∀p n. n < length p ∧ Q s p ⟶ P s (p ! n)"
  shows "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s ∈ S'. succ s ≠ [] ∧ Q s (succ s) ∧ laststate (succ s) ∈ S') ⟹ (∀n. P s (recursiveconcpaths succ s n))"
proof
  assume assum1 : "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s ∈ S'. succ s ≠ [] ∧ Q s (succ s) ∧ laststate (succ s) ∈ S')"
  have res1: "∀n. Q s (concipaths succ s n)"
  proof
    fix n
    show "Q s (concipaths succ s n)"
      apply (induct n)
      apply (simp add: assms(1))
    proof-
      fix n
      show "Q s (concipaths succ s (Suc n))"
        apply (induct n)
        apply (simp add: assum1)
      proof-
        fix n
        assume assum2 : "Q s (concipaths succ s (Suc n))"
(*staat dit al ergens anders?*)
        have "ithpath succ s n ≠ []" by (subst ithpath_notempty [where ?S'=S']; simp add: assum1)
        moreover have "concipaths succ s (Suc n) = concipaths succ s n @ ithpath succ s n" using concipaths_right by metis
        ultimately have laststate: "laststate (concipaths succ s (Suc n)) = laststate (ithpath succ s n)" by simp
        have "laststate (ithpath succ s n) ∈ S'" using ithpath_laststate assum1 by metis
        hence "Q (laststate (ithpath succ s n)) (ithpath succ s (Suc n))" using assum1 by simp
        hence "Q (laststate (concipaths succ s (Suc n))) (ithpath succ s (Suc n))" using laststate by auto
        moreover have "(concipaths succ s (Suc n)) ≠ []" using assum1 by simp
        ultimately have "Q s (concipaths succ s (Suc n) @ ithpath succ s (Suc n))" using assum2 assms(1) by metis
        thus "Q s (concipaths succ s (Suc (Suc n)))" using concipaths_right by metis
      qed
    qed
  qed
  fix n
  have "(∀j<Suc n. ithpath succ s j ≠ [])" using assum1 ithpath_notempty by metis
  moreover have "n < Suc n" by auto
  ultimately have "recursiveconcpaths succ s n = (concipaths succ s (Suc n)) ! n ∧ length (concipaths succ s (Suc n)) ≥ Suc n" using concipaths_nth lengthconcipaths by metis
  moreover have "n < length (concipaths succ s (Suc n)) ⟹ P s ((concipaths succ s (Suc n)) ! n)" using assms(2) res1 by blast
  ultimately show "P s (recursiveconcpaths succ s n)" by auto
qed

lemma exists_extensionpath :
  "(∃p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ enabledactions M s' = {}) ∨ (∃p. validinfpath M s p)"
proof-
  have "(∄p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ enabledactions M s' = {}) ⟹ (∃p. validinfpath M s p)"
  proof-
    assume assum1: "∄p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ enabledactions M s' = {}"
    let ?S' = "{s. ∄p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ enabledactions M s' = {}}"
    have res1: "s ∈ ?S'" using assum1 by auto
    have res2: "∀s'. s' ∈ ?S' ⟶ (∃t. source t = s' ∧ t ∈ transition M ∧ target t ∈ ?S')" using assum1 invariantextension by auto
    show "∃ p. validinfpath M s p"
      apply (rule successorlemma_no_pred)
      using res1 res2 apply blast
      done
  qed
  thus ?thesis by blast
qed  

lemma extendpath :
  assumes "validfinpath M s p s'"
  shows "(∃p' s''. validfinpath M s (p @ p') s'' ∧ enabledactions M s'' = {}) ∨ (∃p'. validinfpath M s (conc p p'))"
proof-
  have "(∃p' s''. validfinpath M s' p' s'' ∧ enabledactions M s'' = {}) ∨ (∃p'. validinfpath M s' p')" using exists_extensionpath by metis 
  thus ?thesis using assms validinfpathsplit validfinpathsplit by metis
qed

lemma splitvalidfinpath_notoccursenabled : 
  assumes feasible: "∀s'. (∃p' s''. validfinpath M s' p' s'' ∧ locked M B s'') ∨ (∃p'. validinfpath M s' p' ∧ P s' (inf p'))"
  and extendinfpath: "∀s' p p'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ validinfpath M s' p' ⟶ P s' (inf p') = P s (inf (conc p p'))"
  shows "(∃p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ ¬ occurs α⇩f (fin p) ∧ enabled M s' α⇩e) =
  ((∃p' s'. validfinpath M s p' s' ∧ (∃i < length p'. ¬(occurs α⇩f (fin (take i p'))) ∧ action (p'!i) ∈ α⇩e) ∧ locked M B s') ∨
  (∃p'. validinfpath M s p' ∧  (∃i. ¬(occurs α⇩f (fin (prefix i p'))) ∧ action (p' i) ∈ α⇩e) ∧ P s (inf p')))" 
  (is "?L = (?R1 ∨ ?R2)")
proof
  {
    assume ?R1
    then obtain p' s' i where assum1 : "i < length p' ∧ validfinpath M s p' s' ∧ ¬(occurs α⇩f (fin (take i p'))) ∧ action (p'!i) ∈ α⇩e ∧ locked M B s'" by auto
    have "action (p'!i) ∈ α⇩e ∧ (source (p'!i), action (p'!i), target (p'!i)) ∈ transition M" using assum1 by auto
    hence "enabled M (source (p'!i)) α⇩e" by (simp add: enabled_def; blast)
    moreover have "validfinpath M s (take i p') (source (p'!i)) ∧ ¬(occurs α⇩f (fin (take i p')))" using assum1 by auto
    ultimately have ?L by auto   
  }
  moreover {
    assume ?R2
    then obtain p' i where assum1 : "validinfpath M s p' ∧  ¬(occurs α⇩f (fin (prefix i p'))) ∧  action (p' i) ∈ α⇩e" by auto
    hence "p' i ∈ transition M ∧ action (p' i) ∈ α⇩e" using validinfpath_def by metis
    hence "(source (p' i), action (p' i), target (p' i)) ∈ transition M ∧ action (p' i) ∈ α⇩e" by simp
    hence "enabled M (source (p' i)) α⇩e" by (simp add: enabled_def; blast)
    hence "validfinpath M s (prefix i p') (source (p' i)) ∧ ¬(occurs α⇩f (fin (prefix i p'))) ∧ enabled M (source (p' i)) α⇩e" using assum1 validinfsubpath by metis
    hence ?L by blast
  }
  ultimately show "(?R1 ∨ ?R2) ⟹ ?L" by blast
next
  assume ?L
  then obtain p s' s'' a where assum1: "validfinpath M s p s' ∧ ¬ occurs α⇩f (fin p) ∧ a ∈ α⇩e ∧ (s', a, s'') ∈ transition M" by (auto simp: enabled_def)
  let ?t = "(s', a, s'')"
  let ?p = "p@[?t]"
  have validfinpath : "validfinpath M s ?p s''" using assum1 by simp
  have "(∃p' s'''. validfinpath M s'' p' s''' ∧ locked M B s''') ∨ (∃p'. validinfpath M s'' p' ∧ P s'' (inf p'))" using feasible by auto
  moreover {
    assume "∃p' s'''. validfinpath M s'' p' s''' ∧ locked M B s'''"
    then obtain p' s''' where "validfinpath M s'' p' s''' ∧ locked M B s'''" by auto
    hence "validfinpath M s (?p@p') s''' ∧ locked M B s'''" using validfinpath by simp 
    moreover have "length p < length (?p@p') ∧ ¬(occurs α⇩f (fin (take (length p) (?p@p')))) ∧ action ((?p@p')!(length p)) ∈ α⇩e" using assum1 by simp
    ultimately have ?R1 by blast
  }
  moreover {
    assume "∃p'. validinfpath M s'' p' ∧ P s'' (inf p')"
    then obtain p' where "validinfpath M s'' p' ∧ P s'' (inf p')" by auto
    hence "validinfpath M s (conc ?p p') ∧ P s (inf (conc ?p p'))" using validinfpathsplit validfinpath extendinfpath by metis
    hence "validinfpath M s (conc ?p p') ∧ P s (inf (conc ?p p')) ∧ ¬(occurs α⇩f (fin (prefix (length p) (conc ?p p')))) ∧ action ((conc ?p p') (length p)) ∈ α⇩e" using assum1 by simp
    hence ?R2 by blast
  }
  ultimately show "?R1 ∨ ?R2" by auto
qed

lemma splitvalidfinpath_notoccurslockedenabled : "(∃p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ ¬ occurs α⇩f (fin p) ∧ (locked M B s' ∨ enabled M s' α⇩e)) =
  ((∃p' s'. validfinpath M s p' s' ∧ ¬ occurs α⇩f (fin p') ∧ locked M B s') ∨ 
  (∃p' s'. validfinpath M s p' s' ∧ (∃i < length p'. ¬(occurs α⇩f (fin (take i p'))) ∧ action (p'!i) ∈ α⇩e) ∧ locked M B s') ∨
  (∃p'. validinfpath M s p' ∧  (∃i. ¬(occurs α⇩f (fin (prefix i p'))) ∧ action (p' i) ∈ α⇩e)))" 
proof-
  have "(∃p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ ¬ occurs α⇩f (fin p) ∧ (locked M B s' ∨ enabled M s' α⇩e)) = 
   ((∃p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ ¬ occurs α⇩f (fin p) ∧ locked M B s') ∨ 
   (∃p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ ¬ occurs α⇩f (fin p) ∧ enabled M s' α⇩e))" by blast
  moreover have "(∃p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ ¬ occurs α⇩f (fin p) ∧ enabled M s' α⇩e) = 
  ((∃p' s'. validfinpath M s p' s' ∧ (∃i < length p'. ¬(occurs α⇩f (fin (take i p'))) ∧ action (p'!i) ∈ α⇩e) ∧ locked M B s') ∨
  (∃p'. validinfpath M s p' ∧  (∃i. ¬(occurs α⇩f (fin (prefix i p'))) ∧ action (p' i) ∈ α⇩e)))"
  proof-
    have "(∃p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ ¬ occurs α⇩f (fin p) ∧ enabled M s' α⇩e) =
    ((∃p' s'. validfinpath M s p' s' ∧ (∃i < length p'. ¬(occurs α⇩f (fin (take i p'))) ∧ action (p'!i) ∈ α⇩e) ∧ locked M B s') ∨
    (∃p'. validinfpath M s p' ∧  (∃i. ¬(occurs α⇩f (fin (prefix i p'))) ∧ action (p' i) ∈ α⇩e) ∧ True))"
      apply (rule splitvalidfinpath_notoccursenabled; simp)
    proof
      fix s'
      have "(∃p' s''. validfinpath M s' p' s'' ∧ enabledactions M s'' = {}) ∨ (∃p'. validinfpath M s' p')" by (rule exists_extensionpath)
      moreover have "∀s''. enabledactions M s'' = {} ⟶ locked M B s''" by (simp add: locked_def)
      ultimately show "(∃p' s''. validfinpath M s' p' s'' ∧ locked M B s'') ∨ (∃p'. validinfpath M s' p')" by auto
    qed
    thus ?thesis by simp
  qed
  ultimately show ?thesis by simp
qed

(*explain*)
lemma freeuntiloccurrenceprogressing_lockedenabled_pred: 
  assumes feasible: "⋀s'. (∃p' s''. validfinpath M s' p' s'' ∧ locked M B s'') ∨ (∃p'. validinfpath M s' p' ∧ P s' (inf p'))"
  and extendinfpath: "⋀s' p p'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ validinfpath M s' p' ⟹ P s' (inf p') = P s (inf (conc p p'))"
  and invarfin: "⋀p s s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ locked M B s' ⟹ P s (fin p)"
  shows "(∃p. freeuntiloccurrence p α⇩f α⇩e ∧ progressing M s B p ∧ P s p) = 
  ((∃p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ ¬ occurs α⇩f (fin p) ∧ (locked M B s' ∨ enabled M s' α⇩e))
  ∨ (∃p. validinfpath M s p ∧ ¬ occurs α⇩f (inf p) ∧ P s (inf p)))"
proof-
  have "(∃p. freeuntiloccurrence p α⇩f α⇩e ∧ progressing M s B p ∧ P s p) = 
  ((∃p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ ¬ occurs α⇩f (fin p) ∧ locked M B s')
  ∨ (∃p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ ¬ occurs α⇩f (fin p) ∧ enabled M s' α⇩e)
  ∨ (∃p. validinfpath M s p ∧ ¬ occurs α⇩f (inf p) ∧ P s (inf p)))"
  apply (subst existfreeuntiloccurrenceprogressing_cases_pred)
  apply (subst splitvalidfinpath_notoccursenabled[where ?P = P])
  using feasible apply blast
  using extendinfpath apply blast
  using invarfin apply blast
  done
  thus ?thesis by blast
qed

lemma freeuntiloccurrenceprogressing_lockedenabled: "(∃p. freeuntiloccurrence p α⇩f α⇩e ∧ progressing M s B p) = 
  ((∃p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ ¬ occurs α⇩f (fin p) ∧ (locked M B s' ∨ enabled M s' α⇩e))
  ∨ (∃p. validinfpath M s p ∧ ¬ occurs α⇩f (inf p)))"
  apply (subst existfreeuntiloccurrenceprogressing_cases)
  apply (subst splitvalidfinpath_notoccurslockedenabled)
  apply auto
  done

lemma progressingsubpath : "progressing M s B p ⟹ (∃s'. validfinpath M s (pref i p) s' ∧ progressing M s' B (suff i p))"
  apply (cases p; simp)
  apply (metis append_take_drop_id validfinpathsplit)
  apply (metis validinfsubpath validinfsubpathright)
  done

lemma progressing_valid : "progressing M s B p ⟹ validpath M s p" by (cases p; auto)

(*lemma "validfinpath M s p s' ∧ validpath M s' p' ⟹ progressing M s' B p' = progressing M s B (extendfinpath p p')"
  apply (cases p'; auto)
  by (metis validfinpathuniquelaststate)*)

(*explain, welke is feasible niet deze*)
lemma splitviolating_predicate [simp] : 
  assumes extendpath: "⋀p p' s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ validpath M s' p' ⟹ P s' p' = P s (extendfinpath p p')"
  shows "(∃p. violating p ρ α⇩f α⇩e ∧ progressing M s B p ∧ P s p) = 
  (∃p p' s'. match ρ p  ∧ validfinpath M s p s' ∧ freeuntiloccurrence p' α⇩f α⇩e ∧ progressing M s' B p' ∧ P s' p')"
 (is "?L = ?R")
proof
  assume ?L
  then obtain p i where "match ρ (pref i p) ∧ freeuntiloccurrence (suff i p) α⇩f α⇩e ∧ progressing M s B p ∧ P s p" using violating_def by blast
  hence "∃s'. validpath M s' (suff i p) ∧ match ρ (pref i p) ∧ validfinpath M s (pref i p) s' ∧ freeuntiloccurrence (suff i p) α⇩f α⇩e ∧ progressing M s' B (suff i p) ∧ P s (extendfinpath (pref i p) (suff i p))" using extendfinpath_pref_suff progressingsubpath progressing_valid by metis
  hence "∃s'. match ρ (pref i p) ∧ validfinpath M s (pref i p) s' ∧ freeuntiloccurrence (suff i p) α⇩f α⇩e ∧ progressing M s' B (suff i p) ∧ P s' (suff i p)" using extendpath by auto
  thus ?R by auto
next
  assume ?R
  then obtain p p' s' where assum1: "match ρ p  ∧ validfinpath M s p s' ∧ freeuntiloccurrence p' α⇩f α⇩e ∧ progressing M s' B p' ∧ P s' p'" by auto
  {
    fix fp
    assume assum2 : "p' = fin fp"
    hence "match ρ p ∧ freeuntiloccurrence (fin fp) α⇩f α⇩e" using assum1 by auto
    hence "match ρ (pref (length p) (fin (p @ fp))) ∧ freeuntiloccurrence ((suff (length p) (fin (p @ fp)))) α⇩f α⇩e" by auto
    hence "violating (fin (p @ fp)) ρ α⇩f α⇩e" unfolding violating_def by blast
    moreover have "progressing M s B (fin (p @ fp)) " using assum1 assum2 extendpath by auto
    moreover have "P s (fin (p @ fp))" using assum1 progressing_valid assum2 extendpath extendfinpath.simps(1) by metis
    ultimately have "∃p. violating p ρ α⇩f α⇩e ∧ progressing M s B p ∧ P s p" by blast
  }
  moreover {
    fix ip
    assume assum2 : "p' = inf ip"
    have "match ρ p ∧ freeuntiloccurrence (inf ip) α⇩f α⇩e" using assum1 assum2 by auto
    hence "match ρ (prefix (length p) (conc p ip)) ∧ freeuntiloccurrence (inf (suffix (length p) (conc p ip))) α⇩f α⇩e" by auto
    hence "violating (inf (conc p ip)) ρ α⇩f α⇩e" unfolding violating_def pref.simps suff.simps by blast
    moreover have "progressing M s B (inf (conc p ip)) ∧ P s (inf (conc p ip))" using assum1 assum2 extendpath by auto
    ultimately have "∃p. violating p ρ α⇩f α⇩e ∧ progressing M s B p ∧ P s p" by blast
  }
  ultimately show "?R ⟹ ?L" by (cases p')
qed

lemma splitviolating [simp] : "(∃p. violating p ρ α⇩f α⇩e ∧ progressing M s B p) =
  (∃p p' s'. match ρ p  ∧ validfinpath M s p s' ∧ freeuntiloccurrence p' α⇩f α⇩e ∧ progressing M s' B p')"
proof-
  have "(∃p. violating p ρ α⇩f α⇩e ∧ progressing M s B p ∧ True) =
  (∃p p' s'. match ρ p  ∧ validfinpath M s p s' ∧ freeuntiloccurrence p' α⇩f α⇩e ∧ progressing M s' B p' ∧ True)"
    by (rule splitviolating_predicate; simp)
  thus ?thesis by simp
qed
